content.text: 0) Fill sterile containers with garlic, chopped fresh dill and cayenne pepper to within an inch of the top.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Fill"@3:7 / AC
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "sterile containers"@8:26 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "garlic"@32:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chopped fresh dill"@40:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cayenne pepper"@63:77 / FOOD )
		:todo ( "within an inch of the top"@81:106 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix the distilled white vinegar and salt in a medium saucepan.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the distilled white vinegar"@7:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@39:43 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium saucepan"@47:64 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour the hot distilled white vinegar and salt mixture into the containers with the garlic mixture.
4) Fill to approximately 1/4 inch from the top.
5) Seal and store in the refrigerator.
